description:
These special edition retro themed approach shoes will instantly evoke strong feelings of nostalgia. Hike the trail, run the boulderfield, approach the route and scramble to the summit. The nubuck leather upper has a protective toecap for durability and friction in jams. To-the-toe lacing locks your foot in place during technical edging. The midsole provides all-day comfort without sacrificing rigidity, and the Impact Brake System™ keeps you sure-footed in mountainous terrain.

  • Uppers are sturdy nubuck leather for abrasion resistance
  • STB Control System™ delivers torsional rigidity and support
  • ESS resoling platform lets you swap out worn down soles and doubles as a rock plate
  • To-the-toe Mythos lacing system ensures a precise fit
  • EVA wrap fabric applied on the lateral and medial sides for extra abrasion protection
  • Lined with non-slip mesh for a secure fit
  • Recycled rubber rand and toe cap for protection
  • Vibram® Mega-Grip outsoles with Impact Brake System™ for durable grip and control
name: La Sportiva TX4 R Approach Shoes - Men's
